content: Golf tournament The **ISPS Handa Singapore Classic** was a [golf](/wiki/Golf) tournament on the [Asian Tour](/wiki/Asian_Tour) from 2010 to 2012 at the Orchid Country Club in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It was played for the first time in September 2010. The purse was [US$](/wiki/United_States_dollar)400,000 in 2010 and 2012 and US$300,000 in 2011. ## Winners YearWinnerScoreTo parMargin of victoryRunner(s)-upISPS Handa Singapore Classic(/wiki/2012_Asian_Tour) [Scott Hend](/wiki/Scott_Hend)199[a]−111 stroke Javier Colomo [David Lipsky](/wiki/David_Lipsky_(golfer)) [Lu Wei-chih](/wiki/Lu_Wei-chih) [Mithun Perera](/wiki/Mithun_Perera)(/wiki/2011_Asian_Tour) [Himmat Rai](/wiki/Himmat_Rai)271−9Playoff [Adilson da Silva](/wiki/Adilson_da_Silva) Elmer Salvador [Guido van der Valk](/wiki/Guido_van_der_Valk) [Tjaart van der Walt](/wiki/Tjaart_van_der_Walt)Handa Singapore Classic(/wiki/2010_Asian_Tour) [Peter Karmis](/wiki/Peter_Karmis)267−212 strokes [Jbe' Kruger](/wiki/Jbe%27_Kruger) ## Notes - Coverage on the Asian Tour's official site This article on a golf tournament is a stub.
